scripts.pub: git commit -am 'pre-publish' --allow-empty && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.pubn: r=1; while [ $r -eq 1 ]; do npm run pub; r=$?; sleep 15; done
scripts.local:deploy: npm run local:deploy-lezer-editor && npm run local:deploy-lezer-sample-grammar
scripts.local:deploy-lezer-editor: npm run build && rsync -arvhP --filter '+ package.json' --filter '+ dist/' --filter '+ dist/**' --filter '- **'  ./ ../lezer-editor/node_modules/${npm_package_name}/
scripts.local:deploy-lezer-sample-grammar: npm run build && rsync -arvhP --filter '+ package.json' --filter '+ dist/' --filter '+ dist/**' --filter '- **'  ./ ../lezer-example-grammar/node_modules/${npm_package_name}/
